Question: At age 74 this person became the oldest of eighteen directors to have directed two or more Best Picture winners.
Hints: The film earned this person a fee of $400,000 (US$2.64 million in 2013 dollars) and 25 percent of its net box-office takings.
This person starred in The Dead Pool (1988), the fifth and final film in the Dirty Harry series.
Governor Schwarzenegger appointed this person to the California Film Commission in April 2004.
